reporting-org.narrative: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan

title.narrative: Regional Workshop on Bamboo Standards Development

description.narrative: Conduct regional workshop with identified stakeholders to introduce the technical guidelines and bamboo standards, enabling them to become national trainers. The workshop will provide advice to national standards authorities on how to adopt bamboo standards and monitor compliance, as well as help to raise awareness among producers about the standard requirements of the EU for major bamboo-traded products.

participating-org.narrative: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR)

activity-date.narrative: Three days workshop on bamboo standard development, adoption and application

sector.narrative: Capacity building of standard agencies and key stakeholders to develop and apply bamboo standards
